description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bug

NETWORKNET-33781- Apostrophe characters in body replaced with ’ when MSG file loaded in MailMessage

NETWORKNET-33808- Saving Appointment from PST to MemoryStream causes Exception Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.

NETWORKNET-33809- Optional Attendees not recognized by Appointment class

NETWORKNET-33811- Extracting appointment from PST misses Organizer and optional attendees

NETWORKNET-33857- MSG created from MSG doesn't open in Outlook

NETWORKNET-33868- Message body alignment issue when converting from MSG to TIFF

NETWORKNET-33871- Exception "The specified string is not in the form required for an e-mail address" raised when MSG converted to EML

NETWORKNET-33873- MSG to EML - Message body characters disturbed

NETWORKNET-33876- Index was out of range exception with MailMessage to MapiMessage conversion

NETWORKNET-33877- PST to EML raises System.FormatException

NETWORKNET-33878- MailMessage.Decrypt() returns "This message is not signed" for an Encrypted and Signed message

NETWORKNET-33880- MSG TO EML: Headers disturbed after conversion_

 

Enhancement

NETWORKNET-33874  PST to EML: From Address in headers is not as per RFC2822
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
